snippet: Kala Ghoda Arts Festival opened in Mumbai on Saturday.
abstract: Kala Ghoda Arts Festival opened in Mumbai on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: The Kala Ghoda Arts Festival opened in Mumbai on Saturday, it will run through Feb.12, Charukesi Ramadurai wrote for the In Transit blog in The New York Times.

headline.main: Mumbai Takes to the Streets With an Arts Festival Open to All
